Creating AIX LPAR on a P Series frame

  • CLI method
  1. Login to the HMC GUI
    1. tgprhmc2 or taitc051 for Lpars @ Lincolnshire
    2. tgprhmc3 for Lpars @ Belgium
  2. Select the correct frame
  3. Expand the Tasks menu to create an AIX/Linux LPAR
  4. Give it a name
  5. Give it a profile name
  6. Select shared CPU or dedicated ( Shared preferred )
  7. Enter processor information
  8. Enter memory information
  9. Enter IO information
  10. Create virtual SCSI adapter
  11. Check this adapter is required for partition activation and then Click on System VIOS Info
  12. Select the Server adapter from the first VIO server
  13. Repeat the same steps for second SCSI adapter from the second VIO server(if in a dual VIOS setup)
  14. Create a virtual ethernet
  15. Enter the VLAN id
  16. Create the second virtual ethernet and enter the VLAN id
  17. All virtual adapters should look like this
  18. Select LHEA ethernet adapters if required
  19. Select HCA if applicable
  20. Set the optional settings. Select not to autostart if using virtual resources.
  21. Click on Finish
